title: School placement for pupils with Down Syndrome

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
I am writing to make a request for information under the Freedom of Information Act 2000.
I would like information regarding pupils with Down syndrome currently being educated within the Sheffield City Council area or with an EHCP (Education Healthcare Plan) overseen by Sheffield City Council. Please provide the numbers for primary and secondary aged children separately and if possible provide this information separately for each year from FS2 to Y11.
I would like the number in each group currently being educated in:
- A mainstream school
- A Special school
- Home educated
- Other provision
Thank you for your help.
Yours faithfully,
R Walton

Dear R Walton,
Thank you for your request for information relating to School placement
for pupils with Down Syndrome which we received on 15/11/2023.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 13/12/2023. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
